game.author: Minetest
game.name: minetest_game
game.short_description: The classic "Minetest". A lightweight and well-maintained base for modding
game.title: Minetest Game

long_description:
A little something I've been working on. Adds clans, functions to manage clans, some new blocks, and some fun survival mechanics.
Intended to be used in a civilization event.

Expect some bugs every now and then, and report them on the issue tracker. If there are any improvements, let me know on github with the tag "enhancements".
name: enhanced_clans
short_description: A little something I've been working on. Adds clans, functions to manage clans, some new blocks, and some fun survival mechanics.
title: Clans
